text:
@Yamiche No its like a cold. It's coronavirus. It's not that difficult. Or Sweden would be dead... They aren't. No lock down. No quartine. Life is pretty normal.

The only major region with dead in the U.S. Is NEW YORK and they purposely killed their elderly.
